name: Sweet Melancholy
description:
Hello ^_^

Sweet Melancholy is a 2D game made in one week for the Weekly Game Jam 150. The theme was "You are the enemy".

Your goal is to guide the character to the end of the level. You have items you can use to influence its path. There are sometimes several possibilities to reach the end of the level.

Due to lack of time, there are only 4 levels available (and a bonus level, depending on your results at the end of the test =D).

Credits

-> Tileset and background image : Quintino Pixels

-> Musics : Ross Bugden
